text:
@HillaryClinton You're right. Teachers can choose to take leave of absence if they have health problems that would make covid19 dangerous to them. We have high enough unemployment that there's people smart enough to fill in until the pandemic is over on Nov 4th. 
@realDonaldTrump @parscale
